user.title: Connect Kiosker
user.description: Enter the base API URL (for example http://tablet-office:8081/api/v1) and the access token generated in the Kiosker app. The integration will validate the connection and fetch device details.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Kiosker
reauth_confirm.description: Update the access token to restore the Kiosker connection.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Kiosker API. Check the URL, network, and that the API is enabled.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Verify the access token.
error.unknown: Unexpected error. Check Home Assistant logs.

navigate_url.name: Navigate to URL
navigate_url.description: Navigate the kiosk browser to a specific URL.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: Optional: choose the Kiosker device to target. Required if you have multiple kiosks configured.

url.name: URL
url.description: Destination URL for the kiosk browser.

set_blackout.name: Set blackout
set_blackout.description: Show or hide the blackout overlay on the kiosk. You can optionally customize the text and colors.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: Optional: target a specific Kiosker device.

text.name: Text
text.description: Optional text to show on the blackout overlay.

background.name: Background color
background.description: Hex color for the blackout background (e.g. #000000).

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: Optional SF Symbol / icon name to display.

expire.name: Expire (seconds)
expire.description: Optional duration before the blackout automatically clears.

set_screensaver.name: Set screensaver
set_screensaver.description: Enable or disable the screensaver and optionally set its visibility.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: Optional: target a specific Kiosker device.

visible.name: Visible
visible.description: Optional: force the screensaver visibility on or off.

set_start_url.name: Set start URL
set_start_url.description: Update the kiosk start page URL used on launch or reset.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: Optional: target a specific Kiosker device.

url.name: URL
url.description: URL to set as the kiosk start page.
